argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | m2pmfzmap.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | m2pmfzmap.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 3 |  | m2pmfzmap.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 4 |  | m2pmfzmap.y | |- Y = ( N Mat P ) |
| 5 |  | m2pmfzmap.t | |- T = ( N matToPolyMat R ) |
| 6 |  | #P_simpl1 | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ S e. NN0 ) /\ ( b e. ( B ^m ( 0 ... S ) ) /\ I e. ( 0 ... S ) ) ) -> N e. Fin ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simpl2 | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ S e. NN0 ) /\ ( b e. ( B ^m ( 0 ... S ) ) /\ I e. ( 0 ... S ) ) ) -> R e. Ring ) |
| 8 |  | #P_elmapi | |- ( b e. ( B ^m ( 0 ... S ) ) -> b : ( 0 ... S ) --> B ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_ffvelrnda | |- ( ( b e. ( B ^m ( 0 ... S ) ) /\ I e. ( 0 ... S ) ) -> ( b ` I ) e. B ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ S e. NN0 ) /\ ( b e. ( B ^m ( 0 ... S ) ) /\ I e. ( 0 ... S ) ) ) -> ( b ` I ) e. B ) |
| 11 | 5, 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_mat2pmatbas | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ ( b ` I ) e. B ) -> ( T ` ( b ` I ) ) e. ( Base ` Y ) ) |
| 12 | 6, 7, 10, 11 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ S e. NN0 ) /\ ( b e. ( B ^m ( 0 ... S ) ) /\ I e. ( 0 ... S ) ) ) -> ( T ` ( b ` I ) ) e. ( Base ` Y ) ) |
